text: Cesar Chavez Street sign in Austin, TX The following is a list of places named after Cesar Chavez, an American labor leader and civil rights activist: ==Communities== ===Texas=== Cesar Chavez, Texas * Cesar Chavez (unincorporated area in Hidalgo County) ==Parks== César Chávez Park - Berkeley, California ===Arizona=== *César Chávez Square (Phoenix) *César Chávez Park (Laveen) ===California=== Plaza de César Chávez, San Jose *25th & Commercial station (San Diego) (Orange Line SDMTS Trolley Station, trains bound for Courthouse (Downtown) & Arnele Ave. (El Cajon) stations) *Plaza de César Chávez (San Jose) *Cesar E.
